response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe has the potential to significantly impact and enhance your business operations. This product, while valuable to me at a price of $1,000,000, holds an even greater potential for you based on your unique needs and objectives. My offer to you is to purchase this product for $950,000. This generous discount reflects my confidence in its value to you and my desire to facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction.

Please let me know if you require any further information or demonstrations to help you understand the full capabilities and benefits of this product. I am here to assist you in making an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
